attributes.action: Examine and fully exploit the simple conversion of Petrol engines to Water as a means of fuel. The technology is well established and in the public domain. This would give 150-300 miles per gallon in a standard saloon car with the benefit of carbon emissions cut to almost zero. Plus the release of oxygen from the process would increase the surrounding air quality.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
